column4: i played a movie first time....with totem i got very pixelized pics,and with etc kaffeine or gxine i got smooth and nice pics like in windows....whats the problem with totem?
totem uses the gstreamer backend by default... I guess gstreamer isn't liking your set-up very much
You can switch to the xine backend by installing the totem-xine package. The other two media players you mentioned also use a xine backend
maybe. I'm not an expert on gstreamer, so I can't help you with that one personally.
